foreignData.name: Lunare Zurückweisung
foreignData.text:
Abspalten {3}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch für seine Abspaltungskosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, entferne den Text in eckigen Klammern.)
Bringe eine Wolf- oder Werwolf-Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.name: Rechazo lunar
foreignData.text:
Recortar {3}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo pagando su coste de recortar. Si lo haces, elimina las palabras que hay entre corchetes.)
Regresa la criatura Lobo o Licántropo objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.name: Rejet lunaire
foreignData.text:
Tranchage {3}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de tranchage. Si vous faites ainsi, retirez les mots entre crochets.)
Renvoyez une créature Loup ou Loup-garou ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.name: Rigetto Lunare
foreignData.text:
Fendere {3}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di fendere. Se lo fai, rimuovi le parole tra le parentesi quadre.)
Fai tornare una creatura Lupo o Mannaro bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.name: 月の拒絶
foreignData.text:
切除{3}{U}（あなたはこの呪文を切除コストで唱えてもよい。そうしたなら、角括弧の中の記述を削除する。）
［狼か狼男である］クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.name: 달의 거부
foreignData.text:
쪼개기 {3}{U} (당신은 쪼개기 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 대괄호 안의 단어들을 제거한다.)
늑대 또는 늑대인간 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.name: Rejeição Lunar
foreignData.text:
Remover {3}{U} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de remover. Se fizer isso, remova as palavras entre colchetes.)
Devolva a criatura Lobo ou Lobisomem alvo para a mão de seu dono.
Compre um card.

foreignData.name: Лунный Отказ
foreignData.text:
Отсечение {3}{U} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Отсечения. Если вы это делаете, удалите слова в квадратных скобках.)
Верните целевое являющееся Волком или Вервольфом существо в руку его владельца.
Возьмите карту.

foreignData.name: 月相拒斥
foreignData.text:
贯通{3}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的贯通费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则删去方括号内的叙述。）
将目标［狼或狼人］生物移回其拥有者手上。
抓一张牌。

foreignData.name: 月相拒斥
foreignData.text:
貫通{3}{U}（你可以支付此咒語的貫通費用來施放它。如果你如此作，則刪去方括號內的敘述。）
將目標〔狼或狼人〕生物移回其擁有者手上。
抽一張牌。

name: Lunar Rejection
originalText:
Cleave {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Return target [
Wolf or Werewolf] creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: If you cast a spell for its cleave cost, that spell doesn't have any of the text in square brackets while it's on the stack.
A cleave cost is an alternative cost that's paid instead of the spell's mana cost. Casting a spell for its cleave cost doesn't change the spell's mana value.

You can't cast a spell for both its cleave cost and another alternative cost. For example, if an effect gives an Alchemist's Retrieval in your graveyard a flashback cost of {U}, you can't cast it from your graveyard for its cleave cost.
If an effect allows you to “cast a spell without paying its mana cost,” you can't cast that spell for its cleave cost.

text:
Cleave {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Return target [Wolf or Werewolf] creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
